creator: Soft Gallery (Pvt) Ltd
descriptionHtml:
The GalleryERP app provides secure mobile access to your GalleryERP apps on the go. GalleryERP is the best online HR software for small and medium businesses that have outgrown spreadsheets. We automate many of the most tedious HR functions and free you up for meaningful work. The GalleryERP app lets you take some of the most important functions with you and makes your most common GalleryERP tasks simple and fast.

* In order to do anything with the GalleryERP app you will need a current GalleryERP account. Find out more and start a free trial at galleryerp.com.

As an employee, our simple interface allows you to
• Company Directory, Everywhere You Go

• Review your team, view or request leave, check in and out for work, view your timesheet, and leave balance and history.

• Browse your company directory, securely view coworker profiles, leave feedback on-the-go.

• Update your user preferences and easily sign in to multiple employers right from your app

As a manager, you can take action wherever you are
• Approve your employee requests easily.
• View your team or individual profiles and immediately take actions relevant to your role.
• Stay connected to your business by gaining quick insight into what's important through interactive reports and dashboards.

We always love to hear what you think. Please send your thoughts, comments and suggestions to hello@softgallery.io

• Company Directory, Everywhere You Go

• Review your team, view or request leave, check in and out for work, view your timesheet, and leave balance and history.

• Browse your company directory, securely view coworker profiles, leave feedback on-the-go.

• Update your user preferences and easily sign in to multiple employers right from your app

As a manager, you can take action wherever you are
• Approve your employee requests easily.
• View your team or individual profiles and immediately take actions relevant to your role.
• Stay connected to your business by gaining quick insight into what's important through interactive reports and dashboards.

We always love to hear what you think. Please send your thoughts, comments and suggestions to hello@softgallery.io
